verses.verse: Now<WG1161> in the fifteenth<WG4003> year<WG2094> of the reign<WG2231> of Tiberius<WG5086> Caesar,<WG2541> Pontius<WG4194> Pilate<WG4091> being governor<WG2230> of Judaea,<WG2449> and Herod<WG2264> being tetrarch<WG5075> of Galilee,<WG1056> and his brother<WG80> Philip<WG5376> tetrarch<WG5075> of Ituraea<WG2484> and of the region<WG5561> of Trachonitis,<WG5139> and Lysanias<WG3078> the tetrarch<WG5075> of Abilene,<WG9>

Annas<WG452> and Caiaphas<WG2533> being<WG1909> the high<WG749> priests,<WG749> the word<WG4487> of God<WG2316> came<WG1096> to John<WG2491> the son<WG5207> of Zacharias<WG2197> in the wilderness.<WG2048>
And he came<WG2064> into<WG1519> all<WG3956> the country<WG4066> about<WG4066> Jordan,<WG2446> preaching<WG2784> the baptism<WG908> of repentance<WG3341> for the remission<WG859> of sins;<WG266>

As it is written<WG1125> in the book<WG976> of the words<WG3056> of Esaias<WG2268> the prophet,<WG4396> saying,<WG3004> The voice<WG5456> of one crying<WG994> in the wilderness,<WG2048> Prepare<WG2090> you the way<WG3598> of the Lord,<WG2962> make<WG4160> his paths<WG5147> straight.<WG2117>

Every<WG3956> valley<WG5327> shall be filled,<WG4137> and every<WG3956> mountain<WG3735> and hill<WG1015> shall be brought<WG5013> low;<WG5013> and the crooked<WG4646> shall be made<WG1519> straight,<WG2117> and the rough<WG5138> ways<WG3598> shall be made<WG1519> smooth;<WG3006>
And all<WG3956> flesh<WG4561> shall see<WG3700> the salvation<WG4992> of God.<WG2316>

Then<WG3767> said<WG3004> he to the multitude<WG3793> that came<WG1607> forth<WG1607> to be baptized<WG907> of him, O generation<WG1081> of vipers,<WG2191> who<WG5101> has warned<WG5263> you to flee<WG5343> from the wrath<WG3709> to come?<WG3195>

Bring<WG4160> forth<WG4160> therefore<WG3767> fruits<WG2590> worthy<WG514> of repentance,<WG3341> and begin<WG756> not to say<WG3004> within<WG1722> yourselves,<WG1438> We have<WG2192> Abraham<WG11> to our father:<WG3962> for I say<WG3004> to you, That God<WG2316> is able<WG1410> of these<WG5130> stones<WG3037> to raise<WG1453> up children<WG5043> to Abraham.<WG11>

And now<WG2235> also<WG2532> the ax<WG513> is laid<WG2749> to the root<WG4491> of the trees:<WG1186> every<WG3956> tree<WG1186> therefore<WG3767> which brings<WG4160> not forth<WG4160> good<WG2570> fruit<WG2590> is hewn<WG1581> down,<WG1581> and cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the fire.<WG4442>
And the people<WG3793> asked<WG1905> him, saying,<WG3004> What<WG5101> shall we do<WG4160> then?<WG3767>

He answers<WG611> and said<WG3004> to them, He that has<WG2192> two<WG1417> coats,<WG5509> let him impart<WG3330> to him that has<WG2192> none;<WG3361> and he that has<WG2192> meat,<WG1033> let him do<WG4160> likewise.<WG3668>
Then<WG1161> came<WG2064> also<WG2532> publicans<WG5057> to be baptized,<WG907> and said<WG2036> to him, Master,<WG1320> what<WG5101> shall we do?<WG4160>
And he said<WG2036> to them, Exact<WG4238> no<WG3367> more<WG4119> than<WG3844> that which is appointed<WG1299> you.

And the soldiers<WG4754> likewise<WG2532> demanded<WG1905> of him, saying,<WG3004> And what<WG5101> shall we do?<WG4160> And he said<WG2036> to them, Do<WG1286> violence<WG1286> to no<WG3367> man,<WG3367> neither<WG3366> accuse<WG4811> any falsely; and be content<WG714> with your<WG5216> wages.<WG3800>
And as the people<WG2992> were in expectation,<WG4328> and all<WG3956> men mused<WG1260> in their hearts<WG2588> of John,<WG2491> whether<WG3379> he were the Christ,<WG5547> or not;

John<WG2491> answered,<WG611> saying<WG3004> to them all,<WG537> I indeed<WG3303> baptize<WG907> you with water;<WG5204> but one mightier<WG2478> than I comes,<WG2064> the lace<WG2438> of whose<WG3739> shoes<WG5266> I am<WG1510> not worthy<WG2425> to unloose:<WG3089> he shall baptize<WG907> you with the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> and with fire:<WG4442>

Whose<WG3739> fan<WG4425> is in his hand,<WG5495> and he will thoroughly<WG1245> purge<WG1245> his floor,<WG257> and will gather<WG4863> the wheat<WG4621> into<WG1519> his garner;<WG596> but the chaff<WG892> he will burn<WG2618> with fire<WG4442> unquenchable.<WG762>
And many<WG4183> other<WG2087> things in his exhortation<WG3870> preached<WG2097> he to the people.<WG2992>

But Herod<WG2264> the tetrarch,<WG5076> being reproved<WG1651> by him for Herodias<WG2266> his brother<WG80> Philip's<WG5376> wife,<WG1135> and for all<WG3956> the evils<WG4190> which<WG3739> Herod<WG2264> had done,<WG4160>
Added<WG4369> yet<WG2596> this<WG5124> above<WG1909> all,<WG3956> that he shut<WG2623> up John<WG2491> in prison.<WG5438>

Now<WG1161> when<WG1722> <WG3588> all<WG537> the people<WG2992> were baptized,<WG907> it came<WG1096> to pass, that Jesus<WG2424> also<WG2532> being baptized,<WG907> and praying,<WG4336> the heaven<WG3772> was opened,<WG455>

And the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> descended<WG2597> in a bodily<WG4984> shape<WG1491> like<WG5616> a dove<WG4058> on him, and a voice<WG5456> came<WG1096> from heaven,<WG3772> which said,<WG3004> You are<WG1488> my beloved<WG27> Son;<WG5207> in you I am well<WG2106> pleased.<WG2106>

And Jesus<WG2424> himself<WG846> began<WG756> to be about<WG5616> thirty<WG5144> years<WG2094> of age, being<WG5607> (as was supposed)<WG3543> the son<WG5207> of Joseph,<WG2501> which was the son of Heli,<WG2242>
Which was the son of Matthat,<WG3158> which was the son of Levi,<WG3017> which was the son of Melchi,<WG3197> which was the son of Janna,<WG2388> which was the son of Joseph,<WG2501>
Which was the son of Mattathias,<WG3161> which was the son of Amos,<WG301> which was the son of Naum,<WG3486> which was the son of Esli,<WG2069> which was the son of Nagge,<WG3477>
Which was the son of Maath,<WG3092> which was the son of Mattathias,<WG3161> which was the son of Semei,<WG4584> which was the son of Joseph,<WG2501> which was the son of Juda,<WG2455>
Which was the son of Joanna,<WG2489> which was the son of Rhesa,<WG4488> which was the son of Zorobabel,<WG2216> which was the son of Salathiel,<WG4528> which was the son of Neri,<WG3518>
Which was the son of Melchi,<WG3197> which was the son of Addi,<WG78> which was the son of Cosam,<WG2973> which was the son of Elmodam,<WG1678> which was the son of Er,<WG2262>
Which was the son of Jose,<WG2499> which was the son of Eliezer,<WG1663> which was the son of Jorim,<WG2497> which was the son of Matthat,<WG3158> which was the son of Levi,<WG3017>
Which was the son of Simeon,<WG4826> which was the son of Juda,<WG2455> which was the son of Joseph,<WG2501> which was the son of Jonan,<WG2494> which was the son of Eliakim,<WG1662>
Which was the son of Melea,<WG3190> which was the son of Menan,<WG3104> which was the son of Mattatha,<WG3160> which was the son of Nathan,<WG3481> which was the son of David,<WG1138>
Which was the son of Jesse,<WG2421> which was the son of Obed,<WG5601> which was the son of Booz,<WG1003> which was the son of Salmon,<WG4533> which was the son of Naasson,<WG3476>
Which was the son of Aminadab,<WG284> which was the son of Aram,<WG689> which was the son of Esrom,<WG2074> which was the son of Phares,<WG5329> which was the son of Juda,<WG2455>
Which was the son of Jacob,<WG2384> which was the son of Isaac,<WG2464> which was the son of Abraham,<WG11> which was the son of Thara,<WG2291> which was the son of Nachor,<WG3493>
Which was the son of Saruch,<WG4562> which was the son of Ragau,<WG4466> which was the son of Phalec,<WG5317> which was the son of Heber,<WG1443> which was the son of Sala,<WG4527>
Which was the son of Cainan,<WG2536> which was the son of Arphaxad,<WG742> which was the son of Sem,<WG4590> which was the son of Noe,<WG3575> which was the son of Lamech,<WG2984>
Which was the son of Mathusala,<WG3103> which was the son of Enoch,<WG1802> which was the son of Jared,<WG2391> which was the son of Maleleel,<WG3121> which was the son of Cainan,<WG2536>
Which was the son of Enos,<WG1800> which was the son of Seth,<WG4589> which was the son of Adam,<WG76> which was the son of God.<WG2316>
